title: PLEASE!!!!! let me make clean purchases
body:
I AM 2 RP AWAY FROM BUYING MY WHOLE PERSONAL SHOP

why is there NO POSSIBLE WAY TO MAKE THAT A CLEAN PURCHASE

riot PLEEEEEEEEEEEASE

replies.body:
Ayyyyy lucky for you we have a little program designed *JUST* for this specific issue! No need to get anxious about a measly 2 RP, draw me a poro pretending to be your favorite champion really quick (doesn't need to be good whatsoever) and I'll see what I can do about getting you that 2 RP.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
There's a simple way to get a tiny amount of RP from Riot. Just send in a picture about League of Legends in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/) and see if they have anything for you.
